name: Legends of Football - Brady Adventure Version
name_original: Legends of Football - Brady Adventure Version
description:
Legends of Football - Brady Adventure Version is a FREE retro action platformer adventure game!

Entertaining gameplay, hours of fun guaranteed!

Find the key to unlock next level, avoid enemy teams and obstacles and find your way out!

Get through all 24 rooms to complete the game - but be careful - it is not as easy as it looks!

Help Brady to jump up and down with just an easy touch.

Get bonus points by collecting coins. Get ranked in leaderboard.

Legends of Football - Brady Adventure Version is waiting for you - download now and share with friends!
